entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
